enum MANET::Device::Status

Server stub, process a message from a Connexion

Parameters:
cc the call context to receive the message
Returns:
0 if ok
1 if connexion is closed
2 if remote node is shutdown
else an error occurs and an exception is thrown
Exceptions:
ComFailure 
Enumerator:
S_OK 
S_CLOSED 
S_SHUTDOWN
